info.title: ManagedNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Managed Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to programmatically view, control, change, and monitor your entire Azure network centrally and with ease.

get.description: The Get ManagedNetworks operation gets a Managed Network Resource, specified by the resource group and Managed Network name

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns the specified Managed Network resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The Put ManagedNetworks operation creates/updates a Managed Network Resource, specified by resource group and Managed Network name

parameters.name: managedNetwork
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create/update a Managed Network Resource

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: The Delete ManagedNetworks operation deletes a Managed Network Resource, specified by the  resource group and Managed Network name

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the specified Managed Network resource tags.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update application gateway tags and/or scope.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the updated Managed Network resource.

201.description: Update successful. The operation returns the updated Managed Network resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The ListByResourceGroup ManagedNetwork operation retrieves all the Managed Network resources in a resource group in a paginated format.

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns all Managed Network resources under the specified resource group in a paginated format

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The ListBySubscription  ManagedNetwork operation retrieves all the Managed Network Resources in the current subscription in a paginated format.

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns all Managed Network resources under the current subscription in a paginated format.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The base resource of the scope assignment.

parameters.name: scopeAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the scope assignment to get.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the scope assignment.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the specify which Managed Network this scope is being assigned

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The base resource of the scope assignment to create. The scope can be any REST resource instance. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider}/{resource-type}/{resource-name}' for a resource.

parameters.name: scopeAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the scope assignment to create.

200.description: Updated - Returns information about the scope assignment.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the scope assignment.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the scope assignment to delete.

parameters.name: scopeAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the scope assignment to delete.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The base resource of the scope assignment.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the scope assignment.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The Get ManagedNetworkGroups operation gets a Managed Network Group specified by the resource group, Managed Network name, and group name

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns the specified Managed Network Group resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The Put ManagedNetworkGroups operation creates or updates a Managed Network Group resource

parameters.name: managedNetworkGroup
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create/update a Managed Network Group resource

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network Group resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network Group resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: The Delete ManagedNetworkGroups operation deletes a Managed Network Group specified by the resource group, Managed Network name, and group name

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The ListByManagedNetwork ManagedNetworkGroup operation retrieves all the Managed Network Groups in a specified Managed Networks in a paginated format.

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns all Managed Network Group resources under the specified Managed Network in a paginated format.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The Get ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation gets a Managed Network Peering Policy resource, specified by the  resource group, Managed Network name, and peering policy name

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns the specified Managed Network Peering Policy resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The Put ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation creates/updates a new Managed Network Peering Policy

parameters.name: managedNetworkPolicy
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create/update a Managed Network Peering Policy

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network Peering Policy resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting Managed Network Peering Policy resource.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: The Delete ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation deletes a Managed Network Peering Policy, specified by the  resource group, Managed Network name, and peering policy name

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The ListByManagedNetwork PeeringPolicies operation retrieves all the Managed Network Peering Policies in a specified Managed Network, in a paginated format.

200.description: Get successful. The operation returns all Managed Network Peering Policy resources in the specified Managed Network, in a paginated format

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available MNC operations.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

scope.description: The collection of management groups, subscriptions, virtual networks, and subnets by the Managed Network. This is a read-only property that is reflective of all ScopeAssignments for this Managed Network

connectivity.description: The collection of groups and policies concerned with connectivity

tags.description: Updates the tags property of the Managed Network

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

ManagedNetworkListResult.description: Result of the request to list Managed Network. It contains a list of Managed Networks and a URL link to get the next set of results.

managementGroups.description: The collection of management groups covered by the Managed Network

subscriptions.description: The collection of subscriptions covered by the Managed Network

virtualNetworks.description: The collection of virtual nets covered by the Managed Network

subnets.description: The collection of  subnets covered by the Managed Network

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next set of results.

ScopeAssignmentListResult.description: Result of the request to list ScopeAssignment. It contains a list of groups and a URL link to get the next set of results.

assignedManagedNetwork.description: The managed network ID with scope will be assigned to.

groups.description: The collection of connectivity related Managed Network Groups within the Managed Network

peerings.description: The collection of Managed Network Peering Policies within the Managed Network

ConnectivityCollection.description: The collection of Connectivity related groups and policies within the Managed Network

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of a network group

kind.description: Responsibility role under which this Managed Network Group will be created

managementGroups.description: The collection of management groups covered by the Managed Network

subscriptions.description: The collection of subscriptions covered by the Managed Network

virtualNetworks.description: The collection of virtual nets covered by the Managed Network

subnets.description: The collection of  subnets covered by the Managed Network

ManagedNetworkGroupProperties.description: Properties of a Managed Network Group

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next set of results.

ManagedNetworkGroupListResult.description: Result of the request to list Managed Network Groups. It contains a list of groups and a URL link to get the next set of results.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of a Managed Network Policy

ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicy.description: The Managed Network Peering Policy resource

type.description: Gets or sets the connectivity type of a network structure policy

hub.description: Gets or sets the hub virtual network ID

spokes.description: Gets or sets the spokes group IDs

mesh.description: Gets or sets the mesh group IDs

ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a Managed Network Peering Policy

hub.description: Gets or sets the hub virtual network ID

spokes.description: Gets or sets the spokes group IDs

HubAndSpokePeeringPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a Hub and Spoke Peering Policy

mesh.description: Gets or sets the mesh group IDs

MeshPeeringPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a Mesh Peering Policy

value.description: Gets a page of Peering Policies

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicyListResult.description: Result of the request to list Managed Network Peering Policies. It contains a list of policies and a URL link to get the next set of results.

ErrorResponse.description: The error response that indicates why an operation has failed.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Managed Network operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Managed Network resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the ManagedNetwork resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ManagedNetworkNameParameter.name: managedNetworkName
ManagedNetworkNameParameter.description: The name of the Managed Network.

ManagedNetworkGroupNameParameter.name: managedNetworkGroupName
ManagedNetworkGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the Managed Network Group.

ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicyNameParameter.name: managedNetworkPeeringPolicyName
ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the Managed Network Peering Policy.

ListPageSizeParameter.name: $top
ListPageSizeParameter.description: May be used to limit the number of results in a page for list queries.

ListSkipTokenParameter.name: $skiptoken
ListSkipTokenParameter.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
